name: sap.watt.common.ui5projecthandler.service.UI5ProjectHandler
description: This service is responsible for handling configurations and descriptors files of UI5 Projects

getAttribute.description: Returns JSON content of the given attribute under handler file document

getHandlerFileName.description: Returns the name of the handler file

getHandlerFilePath.description: Returns string path of handler file document without handler file name

getAppNamespace.description: Returns Application namespace/ID under handler file document

getDataSources.description: Returns JSON object of all data source objects under handler file document

getAllDataSourceNames.description: Returns string array of all data source names under handler file document

getDataSourcesByName.description: Returns JSON of data source object that equal to the given data source name

getDataSourceAnnotationsByName.description: Returns JSON object of annotations objects (containing all annotation data) that belong to the given data source name

getDataSourcesByType.description: Returns JSON Array of data source object that equal to the given data source type

getSourceTemplate.description: Returns JSON of source template by a given document in the project

getDependencies.description: Returns JSON object of all dependencies objects under handler file document

getAllExtensions.description: Returns JSON object with all extensions implemented in the project

isScaffoldingBased.description: Checks if project is using scaffolding

addDataSource.description: Adds JSON content of data source object under the given data source name in the handler file

addDataSourceAnnotation.description: Adds JSON content of annotation object that belong to the given data source name. Also adds reference under data source

addSourceTemplate.description: Adds JSON content of source template by a given document in the project

addExtension.description: Adds JSON content of new extension to the handler file

addDependencies.description: Adds JSON content that represent the dependencies section of the handler file

removeDataSource.description: Removes JSON content of data source object that equal to the given data source name. Does not remove references to it in descriptor file!

removeDataSourceAnnotation.description: Removes annotation reference name from 'annotations' section under the given data source name. Disclaimer! Does not remove the annotation data source itself.

isManifestProjectGuidelinesType.description: Checks if project is using app descriptor manifest.json guidelines

isConfigProjectGuidelinesType.description: Checks if project is using configuration.js guidelines

isComponentProjectGuidelinesType.description: Checks if project is using component.js guidelines

addModel.description: Adds JSON content of model object under the given model name in the handler file

getModels.description: Returns JSON object of all model objects under handler file document

addConfig.description: Adds JSON content of config object under the given config name in the handler file

addExtensionForScaffoldingDataSource.description: Adds an extension data source to a scaffolding data source. The data source is added either to manifest.json or component.js

getConfigs.description: Returns JSON object of all config objects under handler file document

addi18nExtensionModel.description: Adds i18n model under the models section in the handler file

addI18nPath.description: Adds i18n path in the handler file

getI18nPath.description: Returns the path to the i18n properties file in the handler file document

setHCPPlatformBlock.description: Sets the 'sap.platform.hcp' block in the manifest.json file with oContent

setABAPPlatformBlock.description: Sets the 'sap.platform.abap' block in the manifest.json
